ARTICLE#20: [BEST OF AYURVEDA…… AYURVEDA REVEL THE TECHNIQUE….HOW TO RECOVER FASTER IN  AILMENTS ?]

>> FASTER RECOVERY FROM AILMENTS…. THROUGH AYURVEDA’S TECHNIQUE:
When we ail it takes some time to recover either under medcation or without medication i.e. naturally at its own. Like the ailments…fever….headache….wounds…pain…..abcis….tiredness or any kind of ailment. As soon as you know about ailment or you feel any kind of symptoms for getting ailed...just block your active or running nostril by putting cotton ball in that particular nostril. Let the nostril be blocked for the period until you fully recover either for hours or for days. You will recover faster as compare to your other practices.Its amazing. Just practice it for fever or pain…you will find this very useful.


Thanks and best regards with best wishes for over all good health and condition…trusting to have been of services to you I remain…..

Sincerely Yours,
Madan M Pandey (Ayurveda activist, freelance herbalist and research scholar on fundamentals of Ayurveda and rare remedies)
